title: Service Fabric Repositories Overview
body: Service Fabric repositories provide comprehensive resources for Microsoft's distributed systems platform. Main repository (Microsoft/service-fabric) contains core platform code, documentation, and samples. Related repositories include CLI tools (sfctl), Service Fabric Explorer for management, .NET SDKs, and Yeoman generators for scaffolding. Essential for building microservices, understanding Service Fabric architecture, deployment patterns, and troubleshooting distributed applications.
